error.general: An error occurred. Please try again.
error.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
error.server: Server error. Please try again later.
error.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
error.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
error.validation: Please check your input and try again.
error.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
error.outOfStock: This item is out of stock.
error.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
error.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

warning.general: Please review your action before proceeding.
warning.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
warning.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
warning.browserSupport: Your browser may not support all features.

info.endOfList: You've reached the end of the list

confirmation.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
confirmation.cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel?
confirmation.logout: Are you sure you want to log out?
confirmation.clear: Are you sure you want to clear all data?
confirmation.reset: Are you sure you want to reset to default settings?
confirmation.submit: Are you sure you want to submit?
confirmation.approve: Are you sure you want to approve this request?
confirmation.reject: Are you sure you want to reject this request?
